name: Fredkin Gate (CSWAP)
description: Implement the Fredkin (Controlled-SWAP) gate. If control bit is 1, swap the two data bits. Another universal reversible gate used in quantum computing!

hints.text: Fredkin performs a controlled swap: if control=1, swap data1 and data2
In this case, control=1, so you need to swap data1 and data2
SWAP instruction is perfect for this! But can you make it conditional?
